channel.title: neopixels on 3am engineering
channel.description: Recent content in neopixels on 3am engineering

item.title: "Weather!" and working on toy projects
item.description: The Why? The more I work on massive software projects with no end in sight,the less I want to work on projects with no end in sight the more I want to work on smaller projects with a specialized purpose. You see, there are these thoughts that keep bothering me from time to time. Sofware’s lack of physical quality and tangibility, and the general uselessness of most software beyond maximizing shareholder value.
